description: This file is a test specification for the AppComponent of an Angular application named Notes Organizer. It uses Angular's testing utilities to verify that the AppComponent can be instantiated and that its 'title' property is correctly set.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up the testing module with the AppComponent and compiles components asynchronously.

methods.name: it('should create the app')
methods.description: Tests that the AppComponent can be instantiated successfully.

methods.name: it('should have the correct title')
methods.description: Verifies that the 'title' property of the AppComponent is 'Notes Organizer'.
